basics.name: Michael Wybraniec
basics.label: 10 Yearsâ€™ Experience Â· Software Engineer Â· Architecture Â· MCP Servers & Coding Agents
basics.summary: With a decade of professional experience spanning the UK ðŸ‡¬ðŸ‡§, Spain ðŸ‡ªðŸ‡¸, Netherlands ðŸ‡³ðŸ‡±, France ðŸ‡«ðŸ‡· and Poland ðŸ‡µðŸ‡±. I bring a unique blend of hands-on full-stack development and strategic software architecture. Over the past seven years, I have delivered scalable, high-performance applications, and for three years, I have architected complex systems that align technical solutions with business goals. As a tech lead, I have driven cross-functional projects in finance, public safety, healthcare, and Web3, leading developer teams and shaping company policies for sustainable growth. I am also a passionate community builder â€” founding ONE-FRONT and the santeJS JavaScript community â€” and have shared my expertise at industry conferences. Currently, my focus is on AI-driven development projects, integrating LLMs, Agentic workflows, IDEs, and MCP Servers to drive innovation and build next-generation solutions. To contribute to open-source, I have begun publishing content and code on my website's blog and R&D sections, one-front.com.

work.name: ONE-FRONT (Freelance Â· AI-Driven Agentic Development)
work.summary: Delivered high-impact solutions across finance, insurance, public safety, non-profit, and Web3 sectors. Led international teams and end-to-end projects focused on building reliable, scalable, and maintainable systems using modern web technologies and cloud platforms.
highlights: Built and maintained MCP Server for project documentation, using TypeScript and open-source language models to help organize information.
Created a multilingual blog portfolio with error monitoring and easy content management, including French language support.
Led the development of a platform for an Eco Village in France, managing bookings, donations, and events with Vue 3, Laravel, and Stripe.
Designed insurance web applications for SanteVet in France, Spain, and Italy, using Vue, Nuxt, Contentful, and AWS, and helped improve deployment processes.
Developed a secure graph analysis tool for international police, using React, Elasticsearch, and SQL to provide data visualization and fast search.
Built a Web3 NFT marketplace for Aventus in the UK, using Ethereum smart contracts, React, and Node.js to enable online bidding.
Led the creation of a finance and reporting platform with QuickBooks integration and business intelligence tools, helping improve financial forecasts.
Tech Stack: TS Â· Vue Â· React Â· Node Â· GraphQL Â· Sentry Â· Nuxt Â· CMS Â· MCP

work.description:
Key Responsibilities:

work.summary: As a full-stack developer for Interpol via Ripjar and Accenture, I maintained a secure architecture in a scalable intelligence platform supporting European law enforcement agencies. My focus included large-scale graph analytics workflows, entity resolution, and multilingual NLP integration, enabling investigators to extract actionable insights from complex, unstructured data sources.
highlights: Engineered a modular full-stack system for large-scale graph analytics, entity resolution, and real-time visualization.
Integrated heterogeneous data sources across cloud, on-premise, and data lake architectures to support intelligence workflows.
Developed secure orchestration pipelines to automate intelligence and data enrichment processes across agencies.
Implemented natural language processing (NLP) techniques to extract actionable insights from multilingual unstructured data.
Built hardened, high-security features for sensitive on-premise deployments with strict compliance and operational requirements.
Enhanced organizational knowledge and investigative tools with interactive data interfaces and intuitive dashboards.
work.description:

references.name: Marianne Guerrero
references.reference: I had the pleasure to work with Michael. I collaborated with him as a Software Architect. He's very efficient on technical strategic vision. Thanks to his great JavaScript knowledge, my team was able to build a more scalable project with clear steps toward our goal. Moreover, he's a strong facilitator who understands how to bridge business needs and technical constraints.

references.name: Juan Burgos Leon
references.reference: Michael is deeply committed to the projects he works on, demonstrating dynamism and a proactive approach in finding solutions. His profound expertise in technology and architecture ensures he stays abreast of the latest technological advancements.

references.name: Ignas Tornau
references.reference: Iâ€™ve had the pleasure of working with Michael at SantÃ©Vet when he was our Software Architect. He consistently demonstrated a positive attitude and genuine passion for his work. His dedication to enhancing the technical teams across domains was exceptional. He encouraged team members to speak up about issues, leading to tangible improvements in workflows. He initiated dedicated knowledge-sharing sessions, which improved our tech stack and collaboration. Heâ€™s an overall great person to work with â€” we need more like him.

references.name: Francisco Carlos LÃ³pez Jurado
references.reference: I just had the opportunity to work with Michael for 6 months, and it was a nice experience. We were able to work together easily, even though we were remote. His knowledge about the frontend side, good practices, clean code, and architecture design is massive and really useful. I would recommend him without any doubt for all challenges a technical tribe can face. He has great communication skills to share his ideas clearly in an understandable way for everybody. His abilities for leadership are trustable too.

references.name: Marcus Wiseman
references.reference: I had the pleasure of working with Michael, on our team he served as a Software Architect. Michael consistently demonstrated exceptional technical prowess and strategic vision, significantly impacting our projects and overall success. His deep knowledge of JavaScript allowed him to translate complex business requirements into robust, scalable solutions. Michael's innovative mindset and ability to stay ahead of emerging trends provided us with a competitive edge. In addition to his technical expertise, Michael is an excellent leader and communicator, effectively conveying complex concepts to non-technical stakeholders and fostering a culture of continuous learning within our team. His dedication and problem-solving skills were crucial in meeting project deadlines and navigating challenges. I highly recommend Michael to any organization seeking a visionary and skilled Software Architect. He will undoubtedly bring the same level of excellence and innovation to any future endeavor.

references.name: Luiz Lima
references.reference: With great pleasure, I recommend Michael as a Software Architect who possesses outstanding expertise in JavaScript (Node.js, Vue.js) in conjunction with AWS solutions. I have personally experienced his superb leadership, acute perspicacity, and steadfast dedication to providing clients with outstanding results. He has a wonderful capacity for motivating and inspiring his team members, creating a cooperative atmosphere where each person is encouraged to offer their best effort. Leading by example, Michael exhibits an infectious work ethic and commitment to excellence. His ability to design reliable and scalable solutions is impressive, and his meticulous attention to detail guarantees that every component of the software satisfies the highest requirements. We have collaborated on a few projects together.

references.name: Julien SOUQUES
references.reference: Michael consistently demonstrates exceptional support and guidance within our team, offering insights and expert advice whenever needed. His contributions have enhanced our projects and fostered a collaborative and dynamic team environment.

references.name: Hooman Seyfi
references.reference: A team player, someone direct, innovative, open to new ideas, fun to work with. I strongly recommend him but I doubt he needs it knowing his professional skills and experience.

references.reference: I have known Michael for a long time now, and I can recommend him in all honesty. He is the smartest, most kind and fastest learning guy I know. Given opportunity to progress within a company he will rise up with a speed of light.

references.reference: Michael has unique ability to work and adapt to any business environment. He integrated quite well in our diverse environment and was well spotted for his unique out of box thinking on business development and strategy. He also gave us some valuable insight on various ideas, which created some new opportunities in our complex business environment. I would highly recommend Michael, for his consistency in delivering desired results!

references.name: Marta BialobrzeskaKrasteva
references.reference: Michael is an excellent team player. He is hardworking, well organized and proactive person, always ready to share his knowledge and experience. I feel confident in saying that he is capable of handling any situation with thoughtfulness and maturity. He is result oriented and responsible employee always ready to put all his energy and time to accomplish KPI's targets. I highly recommend Michael for any position or endeavor.

references.name: Subhash Shankar
references.reference: Michael is a very committed and knowledgeable professional. He has excellent domain knowledge and is very good in building rapport with all his stakeholders. He has the drive to excel in any role and will be an asset in any organization.

references.name: Frederik Bekker
references.reference: I worked with Michael during my time at Echo-U and found that he was very helpful to anyone who needed support, regardless of their position or role. Easy to get on with and consistently professional.

references.name: Lucas Hawro
references.reference: Michael is a great team player. I have worked with him on numerous projects and was impressed with his proactivity and 'thinking outside the box' attitude. What stands out is Michael's urgency in trying to contribute and bring value to the Team right from the day one. I have never seen him waiting for the 'perfect time' or 'know it all' point. Michael will make an effort to bring the ideas and go the extra mile to learn quickly and make all business goals a reality. I would recommend Michael as a valuable asset to support any business endeavour - an established company or a startup - as he is a great fit everywhere.

references.name: Manu Bozza
references.reference: Michael worked as a tester for our internally developed order intake application, WeConnect. During the time he worked in the project he was very thorough and showed great dedication also going the extra mile by providing improvement suggestions and in general looking for ways to add value to his test results. Thanks to his previous experience he seems also very resourceful and during the testing sessions I noticed that he would use his IT knowledge to overcome unexpected challenges that other users would have needed support for. Michael seemed highly motivated and eager to understand the companyâ€™s functioning both on high level as in process detail level.

references.name: Rebecca Psarri
references.reference: I'd like to recommend Michael as a future employee. I worked with Michael in an international team at Convergys in Newcastle, UK. Our teams shared the goals and office investing enthusiasm and ambitions in developing Cisco accounts in a sales cycle to maximize quarterly revenues. Michael was in a different team but he was always welcome to see us for coffee to chat about the project progress and ideas.
